question: What technology trends are most companies in the finance industry adopting this year?

subtasks.task: Identify all companies in the finance industry from the CompanyInfo table based on the Industry column.
Gather data on the technology focus areas of each identified finance company from the CompanyFocusAreaDetail table to understand their strategic IT initiatives.
Analyze the technological trends related to each focus area by referencing the IndustryITTrend table to determine which technologies are currently emphasized across the finance sector.
Compile and summarize the findings on technology adoption patterns in the finance industry, focusing on common themes and specific technology initiatives.
